thread.title: G20 sees need for 'dialogue,' fails to defuse trade threat

title: G20 sees need for 'dialogue,' fails to defuse trade threat
text:
G20 sees need for 'dialogue,' fails to defuse trade threat 2:07pm GMT - 01:43 
The world's financial leaders reject protectionism and urge ''further dialogue'' on trade, but fail to defuse the threat of a trade war days before U.S. metals tariffs take effect and Washington is to announce measures against China. David Pollard reports.   
The world's financial leaders reject protectionism and urge "further dialogue" on trade, but fail to defuse the threat of a trade war days before U.S. metals tariffs take effect and Washington is to announce measures against China. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2prn8dw
